text_block_list.text:
One weekend afternoon, I saw Nakayama Festa 
entering a back alley. …Those rumors from before 
flashed through my mind.

text_block_list.name: Rough-looking Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
They're looking all over the place looking for her. 
Aaah, I wonder how she'll end up.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Ah? What're you doing? I have a lot of business to attend to.

When I said that, I thought about how I'd she 
was in danger, I had to protect her even if 
it meant putting my life on the line, but ——

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Hah… You're a weirdo too, huh? Oh well, Suit yourself.

text_block_list.name: Diner Owner
text_block_list.text: Hey, Nakayama! Your offal stew's ready!

Nakayama Festa arrived at a diner located on a back-alley. 
The restaurant seemed to be prosperous enough to set up 
tables and chairs outdoors.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Keheh… It's finally here…

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Thanks for the food.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Ahh… yum… Mmm…

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: That really hit the spot. There's nothing like some offal on an empty stomach. I think I'll get some tofu and pork sashimi too.

Just after Nakayama Festa finished eating, 
she was stopped by a police officer.

text_block_list.name: Police Officer
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I thought I recognized you. I've been looking for you. 
Uhhh, are you her guardian?

text_block_list.name: Police Officer
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry, but if you have the time, would you two mind 
accompanying me to the station?

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: …C'mon, let's get this over with.

text_block_list.name: Lively Puppy
text_block_list.text: (Arf! Arf!)

text_block_list.name: Puppy's Owner
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, you remember the one who 
saved your life, don't you Mugi?
choice_data_list:
The one who saved your life… 
are you talking about Nakayama?

text_block_list.name: Police Officer
text_block_list.text:
She took care of that little one after she found it by the 
riverbank. I took it in and promised I'd find it an owner.

text_block_list.name: Police Officer
text_block_list.text:
A misunderstanding on my part led to a bit of trouble, 
but I'm glad I was able to report it properly.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Haaah… Nobody asked you to do that. You don't have to 
call for me every time something like this happens.

Like I thought, it turns out the rumors about 
Nakayama were just a misunderstanding.

The sun is setting and it's almost curfew. As I was thinking 
about suggesting that we head back to school when ——

text_block_list.name: Delinquent-looking Man A
text_block_list.text: Hey, it's her! Nakayama!!

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Eh? What is it now…

We were surrounded by a bunch of rough-looking 
high school kids and had to move to the riverbank.

text_block_list.name: Leader-looking Man
text_block_list.text:
…Nakayama, I've been looking for you. Heard that you cheated 
these guys during a poker game and trashed our reputation.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
I won and they lost. That's all. No cheats, no gimmicks, 
no tricks. Accept the outcome of the game.

text_block_list.name: Delinquent-looking Man A
text_block_list.text:
Shut it! It was obviously rigged!! There's no other reason 
you'd go all in when you had such a shitty hand!

text_block_list.name: Delinquent-looking Man B
text_block_list.text:
You… stop messing around. Or do you want 
me to make sure you'll never run again!?
choice_data_list: I won't let you touch her!

text_block_list.text:
I spoke without thinking after hearing 
the man's threatening words.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Hey, you. Back off. This is between me and these guys.

text_block_list.name: Leader-looking Man
text_block_list.text:
…That badge… are you her trainer? 
Try to get involved you'll be the first to get it.
choice_data_list: <size=38>If that's what makes you happy then go for it.</size>
<size=38>If that's what makes you happy then go for it.</size>

text_block_list.name: Leader-looking Man
text_block_list.text:
What the… are you trying to provoke us! You wanna 
spend the rest of your life giving training instructions 
from a hospital room? Huh?

The man who seems to be their leader cracks his fingers in a 
provocative manner. Honestly, when it came to my confidence 
in my ability to fight them, I wasn't.

But I won't change my mind, no matter what anyone does. 
I have to protect the future of Nakayama Festa. As her trainer, 
I absolutely refuse to back down.

I stepped in front of Nakayama Festa with both arms 
outstretched as, step by step, he slowly approached.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Hey, hey, are you outta your mind?

text_block_list.name: Leader-looking Man
text_block_list.text:
Tch… the hell are you doing?! 
What a pain! Hey, guys! Let's go!

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Hahahahaa! You sure are shaking a lot for someone who 
just put on such a show. Must be new to this.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Don't take those guys so seriously. You can just shrug them off.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: ! Oh, I see how it is.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Kehehe… just take a look at yourself.

Still shaking, I looked at the display window Nakayama Festa 
pointed at to look at my reflection.
The look on my face shocked me.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Hehe… this'll be more interesting than I thought.

As soon as I wandered back to my house, I was hit with 
a wave of exhaustion and collapsed onto my bed.

I look at my hands, which still shook slightly. Remembering my 
earlier appearance, Nakayama Festa's words pop into my head.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Kehehe… just take a look at yourself.

What Nakayama Festa had said with a meaningful smile 
and my own reflection in the window. Those two thoughts 
constantly swirled in my head.
